subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Floyd Landis won the final mountain stage by nearly six minutes, regaining much of the time he lost when he had a near-total loss of energy on a steep, final climb Wednesday.
snippet: Floyd Landis won the final mountain stage by nearly six minutes, regaining much of the time he lost when he had a near-total loss of energy on a steep, final climb Wednesday.
